

Steps for creating a Visual Studio Project:
  1.  Go to File->New Project.
  2.  Select "Empty Project".
  3.  Give it the name "OBGCore" and call the solution "OnlineBoardGame".
  4.  From OBGCore, right-click->Properties
  5.  Go to Configuration Properties->General
  6.  Change Project Defaults.Configuration Type to Utility
  7.  Right-click the solution, and go to Add->New Project
  8.  Call the new project "OBGClient"
  9.  Make another project the same way called "OBGServer"
  10. Right-click OBGClient and go to Project Dependencies
  11. Check OBGCore
  12. Right-click OBGClient->Properties
  13. Switch the configuration to All Configurations
  14. Navigate to Configuration Properties->VC++ Directories
  15. Hilight Include Directories and click edit
  16. Add the OBGCore directory
  17. Save
  18. Repeat steps 7-14 for OBGServer
  19. Add the code files to the directories
  20. For each project, right-click->Add->Existing Item
  21.   Hilight all source and header files and click ok
  22. Congratulations!
